  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El Lazarillo de Tormes</string>
            <string language="en">"The Life of Lazarillo de Tormes"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"das Leben von Lazarillo de Tormes"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"la vie de Lazarillo de Tormes"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"a vida de Lazarillo de Tormes"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"la vita di Lazarillo de Tormes"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Η ζωή Lazarillo de Tormes"</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Guia de lectura interactiva de la novel·la anònima del segle XVI que es considera l'origen de la picaresca. Consta de les seccions següents: "¿Quién lo ha escrito?" (amb informació sobre l'autor i enllaços), "Antes de leer" (amb indicacions prèvies a la lectura), "Comprensió" (amb un test autoavaluatiu de resposta múltiple) i "Después de leer" (amb exercicis interactius sobre lèxic, gramàtica i comprensió lectora).</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive reading guide for the anonymous 16th century novel, considered to be the origin of picaresque literature. It is made up of the following sections: "Who wrote it?" (information on the author and links), "Before reading" (pre-reading activities), "While reading" (multiple-choice self-assessment test), "After reading" (interactive exercises on vocabulary, grammar and reading comprehension).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">segle XVI</string>
            <string language="en">16th century</string>
            <string language="es">siglo XVI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">novel·la</string>
            <string language="en">novel</string>
            <string language="es">novela</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Leseanleitung für den anonymen 16. 
Jahrhundertroman, betrachtet, der Ursprung der picaresque Literatur zu
sein. Sie besteht die folgenden Kapitel: "wer schrieb 
sie?" (Informationen über den Autor und die Links), "vor 
Messwert" (Vormesswertaktivitäten), "beim Ablesen" (Mehrfachwahl 
Selbstbewertung Test), "nach Messwert" (interaktive Übungen auf 
Wortschatz-, Grammatik- und Leseerfassen).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guide interactif de lecture pour le 16ème roman 
anonyme de siècle, considéré comme l'origine de la littérature de 
picaresque. Elle se compose des sections suivantes : "qui 
l'a écrite?" (l'information sur l'auteur et les liens), "avant 
la lecture" (activités de pré-lecture), "tout en lisant" (essai de 
multiple-choix art de l'auto-portrait-assessment), "après la lecture" (exercices 
interactifs sur la compréhension de vocabulaire, de grammaire et de 
lecture).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia interativa da leitura para a 1ã novela 
anonymous do século, considerada ser a origem da literatura do 
picaresque. É composta das seguintes seções: "quem a 
escreveu?" (informação no autor e nas ligações), "antes da 
leitura" (atividades da pre-leitura), "ao ler" (teste do 
self-assessment da múltiplo-escolha), "após a leitura" (exercícios 
interativos na compreensão do vocabulário, da gramática e da 
leitura).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida interattiva della lettura per il sedicesimo
romanzo anonimo di secolo, considerata come l'origine della 
letteratura del picaresque. Si compone di seguenti sezioni: 
"chi la ha scritta?" (le informazioni sull'autore e sui 
collegamenti), "prima di lettura" (attività della pre-lettura), 
"mentre leggendo" (prova di valutazione di se stesso di 
multiplo-scelta), "dopo la lettura" (esercitazioni interattive su 
comprensione di vocabolario, di grammatica e della lettura).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός οδηγός ανάγνωσης για το ανώνυμο 
μυθιστόρημα του 16$ου αιώνα, που θεωρείται η προέλευση της 
πικαρέσκ λογοτεχνίας. Αποτελείται από τα εξής τμήματα: 
"Ποιος το έγραψε;" (πληροφορίες για το συντάκτη και τις
συνδέσεις), "πρίν διαβάζει" (δραστηριότητες προανάγνωσης), 
"διαβάζοντασ" (πολλαπλής επιλογής δοκιμή αυτοαξιολόγησης), "μετά
από να διαβάσει" (διαλογικές ασκήσεις στο λεξιλόγιο, τη 
γραμματική και την ανάγνωση της κατανόησης).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">16. Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">16ème siècle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">1õ século</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">novela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sedicesimo secolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia letteraria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">romanzo</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νέος</string>
          </keyword>
